QuestData.Title: Fight Like a Wildhammer
QuestData.Description: S'not a boast to say that we Thundermars brew the finest ale in the Eastern Kingdoms. It's 220 proof. Yeah, you heard me!$B$BAs folks fled from the south to the town center, they were forced to leave behind their ale.$B$B<Blundy pauses, allowing the gravity of the situation to soak in.>$B$BGET IT BACK! That stuff'll turn even the stringiest of warriors into a whirlin' dervish of mouth-foaming destruction. Get them kegs! S'our only hope!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 10 Kegs of Thundermar Ale from the Thundermar Ruins. Careful - it's got some kick!
QuestData.CompletionText: Get me that ale, $n.$B$BHey, you haven't been skimmin' off the top, have you?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh aye ... we get a few of these kegs out to the boys on the front and we're gonna see some fireworks. Thank you, $n!
